1.content:
The evening starts out with drinks and some starters, the atmosphere is great.
All employees are sitting in groups at round tables, talking with eachother conviviably. It's a good chance to have a chat with colleagues you normally rarely speak to.

The tables are stylishly set, it is all very festive.

Are you on the same table as Ashley, or some other table?
1.title: Table setting

11.content:
You are sitting next to Linda from Human Resources, who you don't know that well but is a nice person and easy to talk to. You have a nice chat together and enjoy the starters.
Linda takes another glass of wine and tells you look out for the next course. Having helped organise the dinner she already knows what's coming next and assures you it's something really good this year.

You chat some more with the other colleagues at your table and have a look around. Ashley is sitting at a table on the other side of the room. She is enjoying herself, chatting with other people. When she sees you looking she waves and smiles at you. Maybe you have a chance to talk to your friend later that evening.

After the starter course it's time for a short break. People go to the restrooms, go out for a smoke and try to mingle a bit with other tables.
11.title: Table with Linda

choices: A large meal under a dome
111.content:
You talked to various colleagues during the break, but now it's time to get back to your table. The next course will be served shortly. Most people are back at their tables, some are still walking around or visiting the toilet.

Some more wine is served and waiters are walking around, preparing the tables for the next course.
Your table companion Linda isn't back yet, so you have a look around and see that none of the women have returned. They must all still be chatting and doing their make-up in the bathroom together. It's always the same with them, if they don't hurry back they may miss the next course.

Then the waiters enter the room to serve the next course. Because of the number of guests not all tables are served simultaneously, but luckily your table is the first to be served. Linda's chair is still empty, hopefully the food won't be cold before she returns.
111.title: The next course

1111.content:
A waiter pushes a cart with a very large platter and an equally large dome on it. It sure looks like a surprise meal, but it must be such a large dish!
Three waiters are necessary to lift the platter from the cart and onto the table. Then they lift the dome to reveal the special surprise.

To your shock you see Linda from Human Resources there. She is completely naked and tied up, lying in the middle of the table. And her being naked isn't even the most shocking part. Her body is golden brown and shiny, she is lying on a large platter with vegetables and she has an apple in her mouth.

That nice woman that was just a while ago sitting next to you, chatting to you, is now lying completely naked in front of you and the other guests. She looks exactly like some roast animal, served as your dinner.

You realize this must be the surprise act they planned this year, but this is really extreme. Seeing how well she's tied up your not even sure if she planned this and is doing this willingly. She does look like she has a smile on her face though, but it's hard to see with that apple in her mouth.

The head waiter smiles and says "Enjoy your meal"
1111.title: A large meal under a dome

11112.content:
This weird act is making you feel uncomfortable and you're not sure if it's appropriate to feel arroused by this beautiful naked body in front of you. She is a colleague after all.
You wonder what will happen next and whether you're expected to do something now.

They really made an effort, there is even a delicious smell coming from where Linda is laying. But when you look closer it looks like Linda isn't even breathing, she is completely still. However beautiful her body is, it looks exactly like a roast piece of meat.

One of your colleagues picks up a knife and to your shock he slices a piece of Linda's butt. She doesn't move at all, she is clearly roasted for real. After that example the others also start slicing and put pieces on their plates. They start laughing and eating, and the chatting resumes. Some of them seem to take a random piece, others carefully look over her body to select a piece to put on their plate.

What do you do?
11112.title: It smells delicious

choices: This was the only special meal
111121.content:
Okay, she really seems to be meant for dinner. She looks like she is smiling and obviously planned this to happen, you now remember her saying the next course would be really special. Who would have thought she was talking about herself?

You pick up a knife and look at her body, it doesn't feel so inappropriate anymore to have a good look at her boobs and other sexy parts. However, you try to select a bit that doesn't feel too private, maybe off her leg?
Carefully you slice a small piece off and put it on your plate. It must be very tender, it is so easy to slice.

After a sip of wine you start eating and find she is very tasty. It now feels okay to feel good about it and have a chat with your colleagues. Automatically you keep filling your plate with more meat and you're enjoying yourself. It is becoming a very sociable evening, you're talking about work and other topics. Of course also the food is discussed, everyone likes the meat very much and you discuss which bits are best and point out good parts to eachother.

Linda turns out to be the best meal you have ever had.

Slowly you're becoming full. You take some more wine, but don't think you can't eat any more meat.
You were so caught up in this special meal you didn't realize you were here with the whole company anymore, but now your becoming aware of your surroundings again
111121.title: Bon appetit

choices: This was the only special meal
1111211.content:
While you were eating you didn't take much notice of the rest of the room, but from the corner of your eye you did see a large dome being delivered to the next table as well.

You now look up and see that the table next to you has a similar meal. A naked women, nicely prepared and roasted golden brown. She looks like the woman from marketing that you briefly talked to when she was still sitting at that table. But now her colleagues are enjoying her meat. You smile to yourself as you realize that you're thinking about which of the two woman was the best meal.

But now you suddenly realize something: Both these tables had one woman sitting there and now have one large human main course, and you haven't seen Ashley after the break. As a matter of fact, none of the women had returned when this course was served.
Surely this isn't something they organized together? Not all women?

As you look around you see a large platter of meat on each table. Then you look at where Ashley was sitting, smiling and waving at you, but she isn't there now. On her table is a large platter as well, but most of it is eaten already.
Someone is chewing on a bone, others are slicing off some more meat.

But, it can't be... she would never...

Then you see Ashley's pretty head lying on the platter, a colleague pushes it aside to get to what's left of her meat.
It feels like the floor is falling away from under your feet as you realize she was one of the meals tonight.

The worst thing is that you're not even sure that you feel so bad because your best friend is gone, or because she wasn't at your table.
1111211.title: There are more special meals

12.content:
You are sitting next to your friend Ashley. She normally dresses very casually, but for this occassion she is wearing a very nice dress and it looks like she even put on some make-up.
It's nice to be at the same table at her, it always feels good to be close to her and it's a good occassion to catch up and enjoy some good food.

Ashley is making some small talk to you and the other colleagues at the table, meanwhile drinking wine and trying to eat a bit. You're really enjoying the starters and talk to Ashley about looking forward to the other courses tonight.

Ashley seems a bit nervous though. She does try to smile and chat a bit, but she's not herself. She doesn't eat much and doesn't really follow the discussions, her mind seems to be pre-occupied with something else.
The last time you saw her nervous like this was when she had to give a presentation for a group, but at a dinner like this she's usually very relaxed.

When she notices you looking at her, she takes another sip of wine and smiles at you. She puts a hand on yours and starts chatting again, looking kindly at you with her pretty eyes. She asks if you're enjoying the meal so far and hopes the rest of the evening will be just as good.

After the starter course it's time for a short break. People go to the restrooms, go out for a smoke and try to mingle a bit with other tables
12.title: Table with Ashley

121.content:
Ashley said goodbye during the break, she had to go do something. So you had to enjoy yourself by chatting to other colleagues. As a matter of fact all women seem to have gone off somewhere together, probably gone to the bathroom and doing their make-up.

It's a good way to get to know some of your colleagues better and to hear stories from other departments. A bell anounces the next course, so it's time to return to your table.

You sit down and notice none of the women have returned yet, so you just enjoy your wine.
It's not uncommon if people return a bit later when the dinner is already being served. You're looking forward to seeing Ashley return though, because you have much more to chat about.
121.title: Time for the next course

1211.content:
In the previous years the women often returned from their bathroom break when the waiters were already starting to serve the food. You wonder if they'll ever learn to be on time.

You grin as you see the women and the waiters enter the room at the same time, well at least they are improving. It doesn't seem to be coincidency however, as the waiters all seem to escort one of the women back to their table.

When Ashley is being escorted back to her table, you see that she isn't wearing her nice dress anymore. All she is wearing is a silver bikini, and the waiter is leading her back to your table on a rope.
This is so weird, and Ashley is clearly looking humiliated. She doesn't really have a bikini-figure, her belly and butt just a bit too curvy for the small bikini bottom, but you think she looks great

Ashley's pretty face has turned red when she is back at your table, she is standing uncomfortable so in the open wearing only a bikini.
1211.title: Ashley returns

info.brief_description: A story about how a company treats its female personnel
info.description:
Pete is working at an engineering company for several years now. The company is growing, both in profit and in size.
Because of the nature of the work there are a lot of male colleagues, unfortunately women are still a minority in this business.

It's not an all male company though. There are also a sales department, phone support, human resources, marketing, which are more diverse and create a little bit more balance in the work force gender.

And of course there is Ashley, the only female engineer in the company. Pete and her have worked together for a long time now, and have become good friends. Ashley enjoys the engineering department, she doesn't want a special treatment and is happy to be 'one of the guys'. Everyone respects her for her knowledge and abilities.
She occassionally chats with the other women and tries to look a bit feminine, but mostly hangs out with her male colleagues and likes to keep a low profile.

Each year there is a large company dinner in a luxury restaurant, meant for networking and relaxing with colleagues.
Usually the female colleagues prepare something special together. Like last year, when they rehearsed and performed a song together. It was more funny than professional, but produced a lot of laughs for the whole company.
This really isn't Ashleys thing, being on stage in the center of attention, one of the 'girls-club', doing girly stuff. But each years she goes along with it, not to be a spoiler, but also because she secretly does like the compliments.
